text: Ara ye tara mata-pitake bale, ‘aphasosa tomadera jan'ya! Tomara ki amake e oyada da'o ye, amake punarukhita kara habe athaca amara age bahu prajanma gata hayeche [1]?’ Takhana tara mata-pita allah‌ra kache phariyada kare bale, ‘durbhoga tomara jan'ya! Tumi imana anayana kara, niscaya allah‌ra oyada satya. Takhana se bale, ‘e to atita kalera upakatha chara kichu'i naya.’
